[[Image:KidmanCruiseEyesWideShut.jpg|thumb|right|220px|The casting of real-life celebrity couple of Nicole Kidman and Tom Cruise fueled wild speculations about the film's content.]]
 
Kubrick's final film was ''[[Eyes Wide Shut]]'', starring then-married actors [[Tom Cruise]] and [[Nicole Kidman]] as a wealthy Manhattan couple on a sexual odyssey.
